attributes.action: David Cameron and George Osbourne to Resign
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned petition for the resignation of David Cameron and George Osbourne.
Since entering office, David Cameron, George Osbourne and the Coalition as a whole have shown themselves repeatedly to be utterly out of touch with the British people's needs and incapable of making improvements to the financial situation in the UK.
This government have systematically criminalised the sick and the poor.
Their response to every embarrassment and failure has been to blame the previous government, who left office over two years ago.
With members of all parties commenting on their concern and distrust of the current government, it is clear that public and political confidence in them is consistently waning.
We call for the resignation of David Cameron and George Osbourne and for a new general election to be called.
